Reviews.Title: son loves it
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: It gets the full five stars because my son (15 years old ) loves it, light weight, not bulky even with a cover on it and it was sold at a wonderful price we both are very happy with this phone and it also works with our windows tablet and his Xbox.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: great phone and fast 4G with att and tmobile, windows phone still need to improve more apps like tango.thanks

Reviews.Title: Arrived a week early!
Reviews.Author: Kristofa Heastie
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife. I got the phone a week earlier than I had expected which is a definite plus (I'm in The Bahamas). She is happy with the phone, but just has to get used to the windows 8 OS. I haven't had a chance to fully test it, but so far it is functioning exactly as I expected. Perhaps, after a few weeks of testing, I'll be back with an update. But as for now, I would certainly recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Nokia Lumia 520 Unlocked GSM Windows 8 OS Cell Phone 8GB - Red
Reviews.Author: D'veed
Reviews.Content: You cannot say enough good things about this little phone. It's a Nokia. It's a Windows Phone with OS 8. It may not be so new, or super powered; BUT, it is inexpensive, FAST, highly customizable, with the ability to upgrade and use the most modern apps in the Windows' store; and I LOVE it. Nokia apps are fantastic! This phone is a perfect back up to my main Windows phone (I want to be able to be with a phone if anything ever happens to my main phone, quickly) It is so good I bought one for my wife and one for a friend (they make GREAT presents).

Reviews.Title: All was ok
Reviews.Author: Penelope
Reviews.Content: I like the cell phone it works perfect the only thing that I don't like it's thatthe box doesn't bring headphones

ProductInfo.Features: Nokia Lumia 520 Red (Factory Unlocked) 4" IPS LCD , Windows Phone 8 , 8GB    SHIP Worldwide
